docs.snippet: The family can’t relax even as Paterno’s reputation, once pristine, grows more threadbare with every development in the case....
docs.lead_paragraph: The family can’t relax even as Paterno’s reputation, once pristine, grows more threadbare with every development in the case.
docs.abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column holds that family of former Penn State football coach Joe Paterno will never be able to escape shame of Jerry Sandusky child sex scandal, much like Sandusky's victims.

headline.main: Family’s Continued Defense of Joe Paterno Is a Painful One
headline.print_headline: His Family’s Continued Defense of Paterno Is a Painful One

docs.snippet: A year after American Pharoah became the first horse since 1978 to win the Triple Crown, U.S. thoroughbred racing officials have struggled to build on that excitement or agree on whether the sport needs a commissioner to rein in its disparate play...
docs.lead_paragraph: A year after American Pharoah became the first horse since 1978 to win the Triple Crown, U.S. thoroughbred racing officials have struggled to build on that excitement or agree on whether the sport needs a commissioner to rein in its disparate players.

headline.main: A Year After American Pharoah, U.S. Horse Racing Faces Uneasy Future

docs.snippet: Andy Laungani, a tailor based in Lexington, Ky., is a fixture in jockeys’ rooms across the country where he ensures that the riders are as colorfully dressed off the racetrack as they are on it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andy Laungani, a tailor based in Lexington, Ky., is a fixture in jockeys’ rooms across the country where he ensures that the riders are as colorfully dressed off the racetrack as they are on it.
docs.abstract: Profile of tailor Andy Laungani, to whom top jockeys turn when they want custom made suits; Laungani notes that even though jockeys' suits use less fabric, they are harder to sew because the workmanship at that size is more 'difficult.'

headline.main: A Jockeys’ Tailor Earns His Stripes at the Racetrack
headline.print_headline: Tailor Earns His Stripes at Racetrack
